title: 2002 Logo - 2 Fonts
content:
Couldn't get any hits on whatthefont. (I did extract the text first but it's not a very big sample.) Logo is from an anime.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818151636im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3_5889.jpg)
author: akovia

comments.content:
"HAIBANE" is probably a customized **[Amigo](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818151636/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Amigo%20-%20Regular&fid=161853980daf8779ed74d8fa07567ee5&fsize=60&text=HAIBANE&fit=1)** by Arthur Baker, available from Adobe, Linotype, Monotype, et others - Design owner: Alpha Omega.

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818151636/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

Awesome! TY  
I never knew that software existed. Too bad they don't make it for Linux. =/  
I also found a font for the first part that also seems somewhat customized. [Planetor](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818151636/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/planetor/)  
Thanks Again!
